page.title: 12Clubs <continued>
page.content:
Thursday. The social club which gives automatic membership for villagers the club has been going since the Parish Hall was built.
{Criftins Women's Institute.} There has been a branch of the W.I. in the area since 1921.Meetings are held monthly in the Parish Hall. Members are encouraged with their talents in various competions.Many visits have taken play to factories, historical houses and other places of interest.Guest speakers give talks on their particular hobbies and interests. At the present time the branch is thriving with some sixty active members.
